titles.title: O Father, Thou Whose Love Profound

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Father, Thou whose love profound a ransom for our souls hath found, before Thy throne we sinners bend; to us Thy pardoning love extend.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Almighty Son, Incarnate Word, our Prophet, Priest, Redeemer, Lord, before Thy throne we sinners bend; to us Thy saving grace extend.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Eternal Spirit, by whose breath the soul is raised from sin and death, before Thy throne we sinners bend; to us Thy quickening pow'r extend.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jehovah! Father, Spirit, Son, mysterious Godhead, Three in One, before Thy throne we sinners bend; grace, pardon, life, to us extend.
